channel.title: Chinese Language Package?
channel.description: I'm trying to download the Chinese version of Counter strike that I stole from an Asian kid from school. It always gets fucked up, and it shows gibberish. Anyone have the chinese language pack so that I can get a chinese friend to tell me what it says. If i manage to get the Chinese language pack can someone tell me how to translate it to enligh myself?
